subject: chore(build): gitignore tsbuildinfo artifacts
body:
vue-tsc -b produces .tsbuildinfo files for incremental builds.
These are machine-specific build cache and should not be tracked.

Tags: build, gitignore
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: infrastructure
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: build-stability
Semver: patch
